can claim from you as his due. Nor has he any right against anybody else
that theyshould give him continued use of your kidneys. Certainly he had
no right against the Society of Music Lovers that they should plug him into
you  in  the  first  place.  And  if  you  now  start  to  unplug  yourself,  having
learned that you will otherwise have to spend nine years in bed with him,
there is nobody in the world who must try to prevent you, in order to see to
it that he is given so
